title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf
notes: Character models are missing, weapons are visible and game appears otherwise playable. I was able to complete the tutorial mission.
specs: AMD Phenom II X4 965 / GeForce GTX 960

notes: Game starts, but won't get beyond initial loading screen (suspect it's a DRM issue as this game can't be played offline)
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf

notes: Was able to pass tutorial mission using PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% option, but after that game fails to connect to server.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf

notes: Since game update 1.1.6, it works fine. All campaign and deck  progress from Windows transitioned successfully.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf

notes:
Runs well after you setup as start option this: 
PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 %command%
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf
